thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Staff - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BRIAN B
title: Excellent Staff
text:
There is a construction site next door that has a temporary Halt Order from the Department of Buildings as of mid March 2017. If you book here check if construction has resumed as being on the east side of the hotel would be noisy.
The rooms are small which will give visitors to NYC an idea of what most apartments in NYC are like! Having said that the rooms have good facilities including TV, refrigerator, complimentary Wi-Fi.
Strangly the bathroom and hallway had linoleum floors with fake wood pattern, and our room at least had a bathroom shower door that didn't close resulting in wet floor and wrinkled flooring. The staff are friends and helpful. During our four day stay there was a blizzard that resulted one evening with the lobby being full of attractive airline cabin crew waiting to check in!
Room Tip: West side would be away from construction site next door See more room tips Green Features: towels are encouraged to be reused however they don't dry in the bathrooms which remain cool
